name: actual-budget
description: Actual is a privacy-focused personal budgeting and finance manager with offline-first architecture. It allows local data control, multi-device sync, budgeting categories, transaction tracking, and report generation. Designed to be self-hosted.
features: Privacy-First Finance: Complete control over your financial data with local-first architecture. Your money, your business.
Offline Capability: Full functionality without internet connection, data stays on your device. Budget anywhere, anytime.
Multi-Device Sync: Seamlessly access your budget across all devices. Stay updated wherever you are.
Smart Tracking: Customizable categories with automatic transaction organization. Effortless expense management.
Financial Insights: Detailed reports reveal spending patterns and trends. Make informed financial decisions.
Bank Integration: Automatic transaction imports from connected accounts. Save time on manual entry.
Cross-Platform: Native desktop apps for Linux, Windows, and macOS. Optimal performance everywhere.
Self-Hosted: Complete ownership and control of your financial information. No third-party access.
